title: minecraft  MineColony怎么装
txt_content: 是不是全放到BIN的minecraft里 我放了 没反应

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
唉... 請至少看一下原帖或內附說明文件...

1. Install Most Recent ModLoader
2. Delete META-INF from the minecraft.jar
3. Copy MineColony 0.7rc12.zip file (inside 'Put into mods folder' folder) into Your .minecraft/mods folder.
4. Copy floorplans folder into Your resources folder
5. Copy MineColony.properties file into Your .minecraft folder

然後又要看不懂了吧... 唉...

1. 安裝最新版的 ModLoader
2. 刪除 minecraft.jar 裡的 META-INF
3. 把 "Put into mods folder" 文件夾裡面的 "MineColony 0.7rc12.zip" 放到 .minecraft\mods 
4. 把 "Put into resources folder" 文件夾裡面的 "floorplans" 放到 .minecraft\resources
5. 把 "Put into minecraft folder" 文件夾裡面的 "MineColony.properties" 放到 .minecraft

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content: - -。。mod专区置顶帖是用来看的不是吃的
